summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5913 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 13, Summit Heights 2nd Addition, being the alley between West 74th Street and West 75th Street, from 32nd Avenue Northwest to approximately 370 feet west thereof; and certain other alleys and streets, by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 78071, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
